name: Void Cube Runner
detailed_description:
WHAT IS VCR?

  • Skill based runner game
  • Feel music
  • Show yourself in leaderboard
  • Be best

If you like infinity running games. Try this out. You have to realize that you are getting better every time. This game will encouragement you to play again each time.

At first you might feel it hard, but every time you try. You're gonna develop.

In the game beginning you'll see random cubes in void. You can do wall run or jump from cubes. This game's logic is simple.

ACTUALLY WHAT IS VCR?

Reflex, talent and prediction necessary game. The longer you go, the more you will have fun. The longer you go, the more you will improve.

short_description: VCR is skill based runner game. Infinity running game meets with music. It's time to show yourself how you are skilled in leaderboard.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-5005U Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 M330
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
